topic.title: ZeroNet TORv3 patch for windows
topic.body: There is any script to patch TORv3 for windows?

1628080727_1BkheWe7wwX2r3HuRQunHFu9jTMtC.body:
Hi
Yeah i have one but i write in persian.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DbaVzv27GUx2LqXnMdrQCtzKcyS2zxdEd

1630441420_15Ef8fbH5j5WZuMNoKum5u6WYFguX.body: Nope, just nofish died, we gotta fork zeronet and develop it by ourselves.

1632420694_13JuGiUNQFGijiA5NWsKsgv8YWBus.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_1204_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Site addresses are just bitcoin addresses, so you can generate them using any bitcoin address generation tool. Vanitygen as mentioned is a popular one used to create stuff like what you mentioned.

i have a bitcoin address generated with vanitygen but how can i create a site with that address?
zeronet's siteCreate command doesn't take any argument for privatekey.

> [kaffie](#comment_1205_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): It already exists. Just create a folder with the site content and visit it. Ideally you'll also want to stick your public and private key in your sites.json file. The sitecreate command just creates the keys and basic folder template for you.

thanks, i'll try that

1632560311_1Qq4LP4T9LVbrnWLcUiQCXkMXJfPR.body:
